ABOUT_CONTENT_1: It all started with Python. Creating shapes in the command line doesn't sound very exciting, but that's where my love for programming started. Three years have passed since then. I learned several new languages, such as C# and TypeScript. I also discovered that my passion lies mainly in front-end development.
ABOUT_CONTENT_2: I am currently studying Computer Science at Rotterdam University of Applied Sciences. I am in my third year and enjoy every minute of it. My internship at MoreApp was a big highlight.
ABOUT_CONTENT_3: In my personal life I usually play some video games or break my brain because of a bug in my code. I am also a huge movie and music nerd. Chances are I'm listening to music right now.
HOME_BIO: By day I am a programmer with experience in languages, such as C# and TypeScript. By night I usually play some video games.  I am also a huge movie and music nerd.
